title: Passing Through Crazy
description: When Jeff and Clover hook up with a one night stand, neither of them imagined the journey it would take them. Jeff, a promising engineer was looking to get lucky and Clover was looking to rebound from her abusive ex-fianc√© Clark. Clover and Jeff decide to explore a possible relationship. But, when the charismatic Clark resurfaces; he has eyes for more than just Clover and a riveting love triangle ensues. Just when the couple thinks they have it figured out, an unexpected love affair blossoms between Jeff and Clark redefining traditional love and family.
author: Vici Howard
